wikitext.*:
On [[30 March]] [[1951]], Tolkien wrote a letter to [[Florence Tolkien]]. 
*'''Subject:''' Tolkien says they are probably third cousins and tells her about the family history.
*'''Publication:''' The letter has not been published in print. It appears in its entirety in an entry made on [[17 April]] [[2019]] on [[Ryszard Derdziński]]'s blog [https://tolkniety.blogspot.com/ Tolkniety].

==History==
Derdziński tells that he became aware of the letter's existence through corresponding with the receiver's granddaughter, [[Charlaine Tolkien]], who contacted him via ancestry.com. The original seems to be lost but a transcript, hand-written by Florence, was preserved.
